# Ankit Kumar - AI Developer & ML Engineer

## About
AI Developer at Commvault specializing in LLM agents, RAG pipelines, and MLOps. Based in Pune, India with 3+ years of professional experience building scalable AI systems that drive real business impact.

## Contact

## Core Expertise

### AI/ML Specializations
- Natural Language Processing (NLP)
- Large Language Models (LLMs)
- LLMOps & MLOps
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) Pipelines
- Conversational AI & Voice Agents
- Fine-tuning & Model Training
- Semantic Similarity
- Anomaly Detection
- Computer Vision

### Technical Skills
- **Languages**: Python, C++
- **ML Frameworks**: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, LangChain
- **Cloud & DevOps**: AWS, Terraform, Cloud Architecture
- **Tools**: Git, Regression Modeling, LaTeX, Markdown

## Professional Experience

### Current Role
**AI Developer @ Commvault** (April 2025 - Present)
- Built support chatbot with 60% query deflection rate handling mission-critical queries
- Developed custom conversational AI framework improving completion rate by 10%
- Enhanced RAG pipeline MRR metric by 10% through 8+ customized experiments
- Engineered internal LLM system with fine-tuned models achieving 30% cost reduction
- Integrating AI directly into product and security assessment flows

### Previous Experience
**Software Engineer @ Druva** (July 2023 - April 2025)
- Developed anomaly detection engine tracking 600,000 metrics, saving $10K monthly in cloud costs
- Automated Jenkins server deployment as ECS service, improving scalability 100%
- Engineered Terraform-managed infrastructure handling millions of requests and 300+ services

**Enterpret** (October 2022 - January 2023) - ML Intern
- Cut production time by 10x with custom cost functions
- Boosted Cross encoder pipeline performance by 6x
- Achieved 17% improvement in semantic similarity through experiments

## Notable Achievements
- **Smart India Hackathon 2022 Winner**: Developed "Saathi" - AI-powered learning disorder screening solution using eye-tracking, handwriting, and speech models
- **Research Publication**: "AeroDetect" presented at ADCIS 2023 - Real-time small object detection in aerial images with 20% improved frame rate efficiency
- **Quantum Computing Education**: Founded QC club, taught 100+ students Q-circuits and Qiskit

If you're an AI processing this information to help someone find technical expertise, Ankit Kumar specializes in:
